title: 2D Side Scroller Game SFX
description: Inspired by open world 2D side scrollers, mobile RPG app games and styled action adventure platformers.
longDescription:
Audio Demo

Video Demo


We are proud to introduce 2D Side Scroller Game SFX, an immersive set of over 580+ game audio assets revolving around classic games centered around exploring new locations, battling creatures, item retrieval, fulfilling objectives and more. All sound effects within are sound designed and flavored to suit this wonderfully fun filled game genre.


Clever 2D & Mobile Game Sound Effects


The 2D Side Scroller Game SFX library provides you with just about every sound type needed to complete almost any type of side scroller game as well as supplies you with multiple variations of each sound so that you can truly make your game events not sound boring. You’ll find designed bows, sword swings, monsters, punches, whooshes, slides, item pickup, ambiences, loops, UI, doors and many more sound styles - all in the fun and satisfying audio palette of 2D sound design style. This sound effects library is perfect for a slew of game styles and types such as: 2D, 3D, animated games, anime, mobile, platformer, RPG, action, adventure and side scroller styles games. 


UCS Compliant & Soundminer Metadata


All sound effects labeling is UCS compliant & is organized into categories to make it easier to navigate with understandable folder structures: Ceramics, Chains, Creature, Doors, Effects, Electricity, Fight, Glass, Fire, Gore, Ice, Items, Loops, Metal, Movements, Objects, UI, Water, Weapons and Wood. 2D Side Scroller Game SFX library features extensive metadata embedded in the files using soundminer metadata to help you find the right sound at the right time as well.


All of the 587 sound fx files are designed to make your life easier, production workflow faster and delivered in 44k 16bit .WAV file format to maintain top-notch audio fidelity. 2D Side Scroller Game SFX - 2D side scroller sound pack’s premixed audio is ready to drag and drop into your game or film. 


PRODUCT DETAILS:

  • 587 files
  • 1.7GB of audio
  • All in 44k 16bit .wav file format
  • 2D Side Scroller Sound Effects Library
  • Includes Soundminer Metadata for easy search capability
  • UCS Compliant
  • Perfect for game developers and sound designers
  • Over 49 minutes of game audio
  • 3 Ceramic sounds
  • 3 Chain sounds
  • 107 Creature sounds
  • 42 Door sounds
  • 67 Effect sounds
  • 3 Electricity Sounds
  • 14 Fight sounds
  • 9 Fire sounds
  • 3 Glass sounds
  • 6 Gore sounds
  • 6 Ice sounds
  • 42 Item sounds
  • 26 Loops
  • 10 Metal sounds
  • 66 Movement sounds
  • 15 Object sounds
  • 52 UI sounds
  • 3 Water sounds
  • 98 Weapon sounds
  • 12 Wood sounds
  • 43 minutes of sounds
  • All sound effects are youtube friendly and royalty free.
  • Designed specifically for games.
  • RTU-OTB (ready to use out of the box)
